The most common seugathis spawned by [neothelids](/Monsters.aspx?ID=739) are seugathi servants. Their masters equip them with tools useful in their tasks (often a wand and a weapon), and they rarely value other material things beyond their usefulness in completing their imprinted mission. **[Recall Knowledge - Aberration](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11)): DC 24 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 22 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 19 [Seugathi Servant](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1048) **Source** [Pathfinder #164: Hands of the Devil](/Sources.aspx?ID=75) pg. 82 **Perception** +14; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12), [tremorsense](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=40) 30 feet **Languages** [Aklo](/Languages.aspx?ID=13), [Undercommon](/Languages.aspx?ID=11); [telepathy](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=37) 100 feet **Skills** [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +15, [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4) +12, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +15, [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) +12, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +13, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +10 **Str** +2 **Dex** +5 **Con** +2 **Int** +2 **Wis** +4 **Cha** +5 **Items** [Longsword](/Weapons.aspx?ID=31) --- **AC** 23 **Fort** +14 **Ref** +17 **Will** +12 +1 status to all saves vs. magic **HP** 75 **Immunities** [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126) **Resistances** bludgeoning 5 **Mindfog Aura** ([enchantment](/Traits.aspx?ID=61), [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106)) 20 feet. A creature that starts its turn in the aura must succeed at a DC 21 Will save or become [confused](/Conditions.aspx?ID=5) for 1 round; on a success, that creature is temporarily immune for 1 minute. A seugathi can suppress or activate this aura as a single action with the [concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32) trait.
**Command Confusion** **Trigger** A creature fails its save against the seugathi's mindfog aura; **Effect** The seugathi determines who the confused creature attacks for that round, instead of the target being randomly determined by the GM. If the chosen target is the confused creature's ally, the creature can immediately attempt a DC 21 Will save; on a success, its target is determined randomly as normal for confusion, and on a critical success the target is no longer confused. --- **Speed** 25 feet **Melee** bite +17 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)), **Damage** 2d6+5 piercing plus seugathi venom **Melee** longsword +14 ([reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192), [versatile P](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)), **Damage** 1d8+5 piercing **Occult Innate Spells** DC 24, attack +16 - **Cantrips (3rd)** [Daze](/Spells.aspx?ID=61), [Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66), [Mage Hand](/Spells.aspx?ID=177), [Telekinetic Projectile](/Spells.aspx?ID=334) - **3rd** [Hypercognition](/Spells.aspx?ID=156), [Levitate](/Spells.aspx?ID=170), [Mind Reading](/Spells.aspx?ID=194) (×3) **Envenom Weapon** ([Manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104)) The seugathi applies their seugathi venom to one weapon they wield. **Magic Item Mastery** A seugathi can Cast a Spell from a magic item even if the spell isn't on their spell list. All such spells are occult spells and use the seugathi's innate spell DC and attack modifier. **Seugathi Venom** ([Poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126)) **Saving Throw** DC 21 Fortitude; **Maximum Duration** 6 rounds; **Stage 1** 1d6 poison damage and [stupefied 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=37) (1 round); **Stage 2** 2d6 poison damage and [deafened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=8) and stupefied 2 (1 round)
name: Seugathi Servant
